meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time or in the same place
meanings.sent1: The two friends lived coextensively in the same neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting were coextensively vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent3: The cats and dogs coextensively napped together on the sunny porch.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness and success were coextensively linked, like two sides of a coin.
meanings.sent5: The stars and the moon shone coextensively in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Corresponding in extent or degree; proportionate
meanings.sent1: The size of the cake was coextensively small for the party.
meanings.sent2: His effort was coextensively matched by his results in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The laughter in the room grew coextensively with the jokes being told.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was coextensively strong, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The temperature and humidity were coextensively high, making it uncomfortable.
